mapper.insert: INSERT INTO CHAT (CHA_NUM, CHA_CONTENTS, CHA_TIME, MEM_ID, ROOM_ID) VALUES( (SELECT NVL(MAX(CHA_NUM), 0)+1 FROM CHAT) , #{chaContents}, SYSDATE, #{memId}, #{roomId})
mapper.select: SELECT CHA_NUM, CHA_CONTENTS,CHA_TIME, MEM_ID ,ROOM_ID FROM CHAT WHERE ROOM_ID = #{roomId} ORDER BY CHA_NUM ASC
